abstract: Stops further propagation of the event.
overview:
## Discussion

Unlike a DOM `Event`, a [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/MapKitEvent] doesn’t go through bubbling or capturing phases. When the propagation stops, the system doesn’t dispatch the event to any event listeners that the framework hasn’t called yet.

# stopPropagation()

**Instance Method**

Stops further propagation of the event.

## Declaration

```swift
stopPropagation(): void;
```

## Discussion

Unlike a DOM `Event`, a [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/MapKitEvent] doesn’t go through bubbling or capturing phases. When the propagation stops, the system doesn’t dispatch the event to any event listeners that the framework hasn’t called yet.
title: stopPropagation()
